directions: In an oven safe bowl, combine artichoke hearts, chile peppers, pimento peppers, mayonnaise, Monterey Jack cheese and almost all of the Parmesan cheese; sprinkle remaining Parmesan cheese on top.  Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until lightly browned.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) cans artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
2 (4 ounce) cans green chile peppers, drained and chopped
1 (4 ounce) jar pimento peppers, drained and chopped
1/2 (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
title: Hot Artichoke Dip
